body:
### Welcome to UX : Xoops Cube Legacy
The main goal of UXCL is to develop an end-user patch/package with a common User Interface and User Experience enhanced for the Content Management System
[XOOPS Cube Legacy - Web Application Platform](http://xoopscube.org). 

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

***

> "Learn everything you can.
> Try everything that comes along.
> Look at everything there is to see.
> Search, experiment, make mistakes, fail, stand up.
> Turn religious, turn conservative, turn radical.
> And then forget all about it and find your way to create."


***

![uxcl admin](https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-zvk7AYsIJlY/T-12NfS-f8I/AAAAAAAAEbg/UAthIRFSxNE/s800/uxcl.jpg)

### UI Design
UXCL has a folder common/ui with some handsome CSS/JS Frameworks used for Themes and Templates. Go ahead and continue to Themes to browse through them. You can easily download the samples to customize the design of your website.

### XOOPS Cube Project
The XOOPS Cube Project is friendly managed, maintained, developed and supported by a volunteer group to expand our network, vision, creativity and skills.
Community website : [XOOPS Cube Legacy - Web Application Platform](http://xoopscube.org)

### Authors and Contributors
XOOPS Cube Project Team has some members already active on GitHub : @kilica, @naao, @nao-pon, @suin, @xoopscube. The contributors list will be updated with GitHub profiles, check their projects.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with UXCL? Check out the documentation at https://github.com/nunoluciano/uxcl/wiki or contact xoopserver@gmail.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.

name: UXCL
